job_title: Registered Nurse, BSN in Kalamazoo, MI
pros: Great company philosophy and goals of care.
cons: Needing managerial and full time employment

pros: Patient care, and i love my colleagues.
cons: Executives and directors are wildly out of touch. We received direction that we are not to communicate to other directors or executives directly and that we must go through our own manager or director to do so. It is demeaning and tells you what upper management thinks of the rest of us. Micromanagement to the nth degree makes it hard to do your job. If you like autonomy, this agency is not for you.
